kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Muhammad al-Bukhari
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū ʿAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʿīl ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mughīrah ibn Bardizbah al-Juʿfī al-Bukhārī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī is a collection of hadīth compiled by Abu Abdullāh Muhammad Ibn Ismā`īl al-Bukhārī. It is recognized by the majority of the Muslim world as one of the most authentic collections of the Sunnah of the Prophet (ﷺ).

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū al-Ḥusayn Muslim ibn al-Ḥajjāj ibn Muslim ibn Ward ibn Kawshādh al-Qushayrī an-Naysābūrī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Sahih Muslim is a renowned collection of hadith compiled by Imam Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj al-Naysaburi.

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Abu Dawood al-Sijistani
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū Dāwūd Sulaymān ibn al-Ashʿath ibn Isḥāq al-Azdī al-Sijistānī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Sunan Abi Dawud is a collection of hadith compiled by Imam Abū Dāwūd Sulaymān ibn al-Ashʿath as-Sijistānī.

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Abu 'Isa Muhammad at-Tirmidhi
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū ʿĪsā Muḥammad ibn ʿĪsā ibn Sawrah ibn Mūsā ibn al-Ḍaḥḥāk al-Sulamī al-Tirmidhī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Jāmi` at-Tirmidhī is a collection of hadīth compiled by Imām Abu `Isa Muhammad at-Tirmidhī.

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Ahmad an-Nasa'i
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū ʿAbd al-Raḥmān Aḥmad ibn Shuʿayb ibn ʿAlī ibn Sinān ibn Baḥr al-Khurāsānī al-Nasāʾī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Sunan an-Nasa'i is a hadith collection by Imam Ahmad an-Nasa'i.

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Muhammad bin Yazid Ibn Majah al-Qazvini
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yazīd ibn Mājah al-Rabʻī al-Qazwīnī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Sunan Ibn Mājah is a collection of hadīth compiled by Imām Muḥammad bin Yazīd Ibn Mājah al-Qazvīnī.

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Yahya ibn Sharaf an-Nawawi
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū Zakariyyā Yaḥyā ibn Sharaf ibn Murī ibn Ḥasan ibn Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad an-Nawawī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Riyad as-Salihin (The Gardens of the Righteous) is a collection of authentic hadiths compiled by Imam an-Nawawi. It focuses on ethics, manners, and spirituality, covering topics such as sincerity, patience, gratitude, and humility. It is one of the most widely read and referenced hadith books among Muslims worldwide.

kutub_al_sittah.author: Imam Yahya ibn Sharaf an-Nawawi
kutub_al_sittah.real_name: Abū Zakariyyā Yaḥyā ibn Sharaf ibn Murī ibn Ḥasan ibn Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad an-Nawawī
kutub_al_sittah.description: Arba'in an-Nawawi (The Forty Hadith of an-Nawawi) is a compilation of forty-two fundamental hadith of Islam. The collection is highly regarded as a concise summary of the essential principles of Islamic law and morality.
